dist.hmm

Interface StateDistribution

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConditionalStateDistributionWrapper, SimpleStateDistribution, SimpleStateDistributionTable

    public interface StateDistribution
    An interface for state probalility functions that represent the probabilty of transitioning to a state and also the probability of starting in a state
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu

      • estimate

        void estimate(double[][] expectations,
            DataSet sequence)
        Match the given expectations and observations
        Parameters:
        expectations - entry [k][j] is the probability of transitioning from this state to state j correpsonding to observation k, k can be seen as kind of like t all though it is not in practice since observations is many sequences glued together
        sequence - the sequence of corresponding observations
